card.name: Absorb Vis
card.property: Target player loses 4 life and you gain 4 life. Basic landcycling {1}{B} ({1}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Akoum Refuge
card.property: Akoum Refuge enters the battlefield tapped. When Akoum Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Ancient Craving
card.property: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.

card.name: Ashmouth Hound
card.property: Whenever Ashmouth Hound blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, Ashmouth Hound deals 1 damage to that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its fiery paws make it easy to track, which is very useful when you want to go in exactly the opposite direction.

card.name: Blazing Salvo
card.property: Blazing Salvo deals 3 damage to target creature unless that creature's controller has Blazing Salvo deal 5 damage to him or her.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Barbarians equate courage with the ability to endure pain.

card.name: Blightning
card.property: Blightning deals 3 damage to target player. That player discards two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the spirit of inquiry, Tibalt applied a battery of agony spells. They yielded nothing on the vampire's whereabouts, but the screams were reward enough.

card.name: Bloodrage Vampire
card.property: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The most genteel facades hide the most abominable desires.

card.name: Breaking Point
card.property: Any player may have Breaking Point deal 6 damage to him or her. If no one does, destroy all creatures. Creatures destroyed this way can't be regenerated.

card.name: Browbeat
card.property: Any player may have Browbeat deal 5 damage to him or her. If no one does, target player draws three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Pained defiance or shameful surrender—every reaction is a pleasant surprise."—Tibalt

card.name: Bump in the Night
card.property: Target opponent loses 3 life. Flashback {5}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's not just the wind. It's not all in your head. And it's definitely something to worry about.

card.name: Butcher of Malakir
card.property: Flying Whenever Butcher of Malakir or another creature you control dies, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His verdict is always guilty. His sentence is always death.

card.name: Child of Night
card.property: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sins that would be too gruesome in the light of day are made more pleasing in the dark of night.

card.name: Coal Stoker
card.property: When Coal Stoker enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, add {R}{R}{R} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The day is mine! I sent three such creatures against my foe, then watched as my magefire popped her soldiers like overripe spleenfruits."—Dobruk the Unstable, pyromancer

card.name: Corpse Connoisseur
card.property: When Corpse Connoisseur enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card and put that card into your graveyard. If you do, shuffle your library. Unearth {3}{B} ({3}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Death Grasp
card.property: Death Grasp deals X damage to target creature or player. You gain X life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Plate mail, the skin of the chest, the rib cage, the heart—all useless against the mage who can reach directly for the soul.

card.name: Decompose
card.property: Exile up to three target cards from a single graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sheesh! How am I supposed to make a decent living around here?"—Cabal grave robber

card.name: Devil's Play
card.property: Devil's Play deals X damage to target creature or player. Flashback {X}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A devil's hands are never idle.

card.name: Doomed Traveler
card.property: When Doomed Traveler dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He vowed he would never rest until he reached his destination. He doesn't know how right he was.

card.name: Duskhunter Bat
card.property: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.) Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The swamps go silent at its approach, but it still hears the heartbeat of the prey within.

card.name: Evolving Wilds
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Without the interfering hands of civilization, nature will always shape itself to its own needs.

card.name: Faithless Looting
card.property: Draw two cards, then discard two cards. Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Avacyn has abandoned us! We have nothing left except what we can take!"

card.name: Field of Souls
card.property: Whenever a nontoken creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

card.name: Fiend Hunter
card.property: When Fiend Hunter enters the battlefield, you may exile another target creature. When Fiend Hunter leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Flame Javelin
card.property: ({2/R} can be paid with any two mana or with {R}. This card's converted mana cost is 6.) Flame Javelin deals 4 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gyara Spearhurler would have been renowned for her deadly accuracy, if it weren't for her deadly accuracy.

card.name: Flame Slash
card.property: Flame Slash deals 4 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After millennia asleep, the Eldrazi had forgotten about Zendikar's fiery temper and dislike of strangers.

card.name: Gang of Devils
card.property: When Gang of Devils dies, it deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures and/or players.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Well, how could I know they'd explode?"—Gregel, township militia

card.name: Gatekeeper of Malakir
card.property: Kicker {B} (You may pay an additional {B} as you cast this spell.) When Gatekeeper of Malakir enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, target player sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You may enter the city—once the toll is paid."

card.name: Geistflame
card.property: Geistflame deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Flashback {3}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Innistrad pyromancers find their best raw materials in the fury of the dead.

card.name: Goblin Arsonist
card.property: When Goblin Arsonist dies, you may have it deal 1 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With great power comes great risk of getting yourself killed.

card.name: Hellrider
card.property: Haste Whenever a creature you control attacks, Hellrider deals 1 damage to defending player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Behind every devil's mayhem lurks a demon's scheme."—Rem Karolus, Blade of the Inquisitors

card.name: Hellspark Elemental
card.property: Trample, haste At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Hellspark Elemental. Unearth {1}{R} ({1}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Lavaborn Muse
card.property: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has two or fewer cards in hand, Lavaborn Muse deals 3 damage to him or her.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Her voice is disaster, painful and final."—Matoc, lavamancer

card.name: Lingering Souls
card.property: Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying. Flashback {1}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The murdered inhabitants of Hollowhenge impart to the living the terror they felt in death.

card.name: Mad Prophet
card.property: Haste {T}, Discard a card: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's no heron in the moon! It's a shrew, a five-legged shrew, with a voice like whispering thunder!"

card.name: Mark of the Vampire
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has lifelink. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My 'condition' is a trial. The weak are consumed by it. The strong transcend it."—Sorin Markov

card.name: Mausoleum Guard
card.property: When Mausoleum Guard dies, create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ghoulcallers trying to get in, geists trying to get out . . . . This duty is never dull."

card.name: Mesmeric Fiend
card.property: When Mesmeric Fiend enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals his or her hand and you choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card. When Mesmeric Fiend leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to its owner's hand.

card.name: Mortify
card.property: Destroy target creature or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many who cross Sorin's path come down with a sudden and fatal case of being-in-the-way-of-a-millennia-old-vampire.

card.name: Mountain
card.property: ({T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Phantom General
card.property: Creature tokens you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After his death, the general was reunited with fallen soldiers from over thirty of his campaigns.

card.name: Plains
card.property: ({T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Pyroclasm
card.property: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Chaos does not choose its enemies.

card.name: Rakdos Carnarium
card.property: Rakdos Carnarium enters the battlefield tapped. When Rakdos Carnarium enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {B}{R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Reassembling Skeleton
card.property: {1} {B}: Return Reassembling Skeleton from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They may show up with the wrong thigh bone or mandible, but they always show up."—Zul Ashur, lich lord

card.name: Recoup
card.property: Target sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost. (Mana cost includes color.) Flashback {3}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Revenant Patriarch
card.property: When Revenant Patriarch enters the battlefield, if {W} was spent to cast it, target player skips his or her next combat phase. Revenant Patriarch can't block.

card.name: Scorched Rusalka
card.property: {R}, Sacrifice a creature: Scorched Rusalka deals 1 damage to target player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each small blaze she sets jogs her memory, letting her piece together the mystery of her own fiery end.

card.name: Scourge Devil
card.property: When Scourge Devil enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn. Unearth {2}{R} ({2}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Sengir Vampire
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Empires rise and fall, but evil is eternal.

card.name: Shambling Remains
card.property: Shambling Remains can't block. Unearth {B}{R} ({B}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Skirsdag Cultist
card.property: {R}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Skirsdag Cultist deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Within blood is life. Within life is fire. Within fire is the path to our masters' glory!"

card.name: Sorin, Lord of Innistrad
card.property: +1: Create a 1/1 black Vampire creature token with lifelink. −2: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control get +1/+0." −6: Destroy up to three target creatures and/or other planeswalkers. Return each card put into a graveyard this way to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Sorin's Thirst
card.property: Sorin's Thirst deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All your steel won't protect you if your will is weak."

card.name: Spectral Procession
card.property: Create three 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I need never remember my past associates, my victims, my mistakes. Innistrad preserves them all for me."—Sorin Markov

card.name: Strangling Soot
card.property: Destroy target creature with toughness 3 or less. Flashback {5}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What good is your blade without your breath?"—Greht, Gathan warlord

card.name: Sulfuric Vortex
card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Sulfuric Vortex deals 2 damage to that player. If a player would gain life, that player gains no life instead.

card.name: Swamp
card.property: ({T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Tainted Field
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool. Activate this ability only if you control a Swamp.

card.name: Terminate
card.property: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've seen death before. My mother succumbing to illness, my comrades bleeding on the battlefield . . . But I'd never seen anything as dreadful as that."—Taani, berserker of Etlan

card.name: Tibalt, the Fiend-Blooded
card.property: +1: Draw a card, then discard a card at random. −4: Tibalt, the Fiend-Blooded deals damage equal to the number of cards in target player's hand to that player. −6: Gain control of all creatures until end of turn. Untap them. They gain haste until end of turn.

card.name: Torrent of Souls
card.property: Return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield if {B} was spent to cast Torrent of Souls. Creatures target player controls get +2/+0 and gain haste until end of turn if {R} was spent to cast Torrent of Souls. (Do both if {B}{R} was spent.)

card.name: Twilight Drover
card.property: Whenever a creature token leaves the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Twilight Drover. {2}{W}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Twilight Drover: Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.

card.name: Unmake
card.property: Exile target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A gwyllion's favorite trap is the vanity mirror. A bewitched piece of glass traps the looker's soul and does away with the body.

card.name: Urge to Feed
card.property: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. You may tap any number of untapped Vampire creatures you control. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on each of those Vampires.

card.name: Vampire Lacerator
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life unless an opponent has 10 or less life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The lacerators cut themselves before each hunt. They must feed before the sun rises or bleed to death.

card.name: Vampire Nighthawk
card.property: Flying, deathtouch, lifelink

card.name: Vampire Outcasts
card.property: Bloodthirst 2 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.) Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

card.name: Vampire's Bite
card.property: Kicker {2}{B} (You may pay an additional {2}{B} as you cast this spell.) Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn. If Vampire's Bite was kicked, that creature gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

card.name: Vithian Stinger
card.property: {T}: Vithian Stinger deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Unearth {1}{R} ({1}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Wall of Omens
card.property: Defender When Wall of Omens enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I search for a vision of Zendikar that does not include the Eldrazi."—Expedition journal entry

card.name: Zealous Persecution
card.property: Until end of turn, creatures you control get +1/+1 and creatures your opponents control get -1/-1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Jharic returned from Grixis changed, a haunted look in her eyes. She destroyed them with an unholy glee that made me shudder."—Knight-Captain Wyhorn
